response.original_title: K2 - TRIUMPH AND TRAGEDY ON THE SAVAGE MOUNTAIN
response.overview: K2, "the savage mountain", is the second-highest peak in the world - and the most difficult to cllimb. In 1986, it was the site of both dazzling triumph and great loss as twenty-seven men and women reached the top but thirteen died trying. Tto this day it ramains the single greatest tragedy in the history of mountaineering.
response.title: K2 - TRIUMPH AND TRAGEDY ON THE SAVAGE MOUNTAIN
